title: stuck in the reconnect screen
body: i lost 19 lp after my team remade because everytime i clicked the reconnect button in the client it went right back to the reconnect screen. I tried closing the client and reopening the client and the same thing continued to happen i lost lp for it so yknow im kinda mad

replies.body:
It sounds like your connection is *unstable* to the gameservers. This could be caused by any number of incompatible network settings. I strongly recommend [**configuring your network settings for League**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in order to prevent any possible conflicts.

Let me know if this resolved your issues connecting to matches.
after losing another 19 lp because of the "bug" I decided to take a break and try and figure it out the next day this morning when i logged on everything seemed to be normal
